__e: When your mom died a thousand people said a thousand stupid things to me and I just wanted one of them to give me a reason not to die.
Seeing guys get sick for being stupid, makes me wanna do something.

Drugs have a way of making you do shit you don't wanna do.
- It's cause of... the stupid things I said last time, right?
